entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Sault Ste. Marie

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snowshower, -3.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sault Ste. Marie Airport 11:16 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023
Condition: Light Snowshower
Temperature: -3.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa rising
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 79 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -6.7°C
Wind: W 37 km/h gust 50 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 after midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023
